# Barbara Howar

Barbara Stephanye Howar ( Dearing; September 27, 1934 â€“ August 2, 2024) was an American author and socialite.
She wrote the 1973 memoir Laughing All the Way and the 1976 novel Making Ends Meet. She died at her home in Los Angeles, California, at the age of 89.
